result.title: Report from interviews with users in Alaska
result.description: Report from interviews with CBM programs and information users in Alaska The report will summarize the results of the interviews including a concept map that describes the current information system for permafrost thaw and coastal erosion including who the stakeholders and observers are and what the information flow is between groups The report will include areas of interest identified for potential development of user requirements for APS

category.title: Legal Basis
category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

result.title: Open days (overall 8)
result.description: We will also present the latest research results to the general public Through open days we will popularize and disseminate awareness of the latest results of research in the fields of human robotic systems smart sensor including humanmachine vision artificial lighting and rapid prototyping technologies in order to take advantage of new smart and nanomaterials in the design of robots and light sources In the period from M16 to M36 we plan 2 open day for general publicIn order to attract interest in research results from industry experts we will also hold open days for interested persons from the application sphere Their opinions are very important and beneficial for the purpose of the project and further development of TUL research activities in this field as they provide direction for new applications and for TUL they can bring new contractual research which contribute to the financial sustainability of the university In the period from M16 to M36 we plan 6 open days for industry experts
